data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Quintal, Bladimir Rodríguez, Goy, Joseph W. (2019): A new species of the Stenopodidean shrimp Genus Spongicola (Crustacea: Decapoda: Spongicolidae) representing the first record of the genus from the Atlantic Ocean. Zootaxa 4648 (2): 393-400, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4648.2.12|3 occurrences
